description.value: The Untouchable gains the Deny the Witch Talent. Gains +20 to Evasion Tests against Psychic Attacks and to Opposed Tests to resist Psychic Powers. Stacks with Resistance (Psychic Powers). Talent can be purchased multiple times, each additional purchase increases the bonus by +5. Deny the Witch: The Untouchable can use their Willpower Characteristic when making Evasion Reactions against Ranged or Melee Psychic Attacks, and is not required to move when avoiding area of effect psychic attacks.
